description:
Application for a Non Material Amendment to planning permission Ref P2018/0429/FUL dated 16/11/2018 that granted:  Demolition of all existing buildings and erection of part-1, part-2 and part-5 plus basement buildings to provide 3,330sqm of commercial (B1) floorspace and 670sqm of residential (C3) floorspace over 8-units. Associated refuse and cycle storage. 
The non-material minor amendments seek to amend the wording of the description of development to the following:
'Demolition of all existing buildings and erection of new buildings to provide commercial (B1) floorspace and residential accommodation, with associated refuse and cycle storage.'
The application also seeks to amend the wording of condition 2 (Approved Plans) to incorporate the specifics of the development.
decision_conditions:
The description of development of planning consent P2018/0429/FUL dated 16/11/2018 should now read as:
'Demolition of all existing buildings and erection of new buildings to provide commercial (B1) floorspace and residential accommodation, with associated refuse and cycle storage.'
The wording of condition 2 (Approved Plans) attached to planning consent P2018/0429/FUL dated 16/11/2018 should now read as:
'CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents listed below. 
4380-PA-001; 4380-PA-100; 4380PA-101; 4380-PA102; 4380-PA-105; 4380-PA-106; 4380-PA-110; 4380-PA-111; 4380PA-120; 4380-PA-200 Rev. C; 4380-PA-201; 4380-PA-202; 4380-PA-205 Rev. A; 4380-PA-210 Rev. B; 4380-PA220; 4380-PA-220; 4380-PA-300; 4380-PA-301; 4380PA-305; 4380-PA-306; 4380-PA-310; 4380-PA-311; 4380-PA-312; 4380-PA-313; 4380PA-320; 4380-PA-420; 4380-PA-421; 4380-PA-422; 4380-PA-423; 4380-PA-424; 4380PA-425; Phasing Diagram 001; Design & Access Statement prepared by GML Architects; Planning Statement prepared by Rolfe Judd Planning; Energy Statement prepared by Greengage; Sustainability Statement prepared by Greengage; Transport Statement and Travel Plan prepared by Phil Jones Associates; Sunlight Daylight Report prepared by GIA; Air Quality Assessment prepared by Entran; Archaeological Desktop Report prepared by MOLA; Heritage Statement prepared by KM Heritage; Noise Report prepared by Entran; Arboricultural report prepared by Greengage; Environmental Assessment prepared by AP Geotechnics.
In respect of the development hereby permitted, it shall provide: 
- 8 residential units and 670sqm of residential floorspace (Class C3) 
- 3,330 sqm of office space (Class B1) 
- Buildings consisting of part-1, part-2 and part-5 plus basement  
 
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.'
